name: habittrove
description: HabitTrove is a simple self-hosted habit-building app that lets users create tasks, track consistency, and view streaks with an attractive mobile-friendly web interface.
features: Simplicity: Clean interface, Easy setup, No complexity. Start tracking instantly.
Streaks: Visual streak tracking, Consistency metrics, Motivation system. Build momentum.
Mobile-First: Responsive design, Touch-friendly, Fast loading. Perfect for phones.
Tasks: Daily habits, Custom schedules, Flexible tracking. Adapt to your life.
Progress: Visual indicators, Completion rates, Historical data. See your journey.
Lightweight: Fast performance, Minimal resources, Quick access. No bloat.
Self-Hosted: Complete control, Privacy-first, Your data. Own your habits.
Free: Open source, No subscriptions, Community-driven. Always free.
